meanings.definition: To incorrectly attribute or assign something to a wrong source or origin.
meanings.sent1: She kept misattributing the quotes to the wrong authors.
meanings.sent2: He realized he was misattributing the success of the project to the wrong team member.
meanings.sent3: The detective's habit of misattributing clues led to some comical misunderstandings.
meanings.sent4: Her habit of misattributing blame was like trying to fit a square peg in a round hole.
meanings.sent5: Misattributing the painting to the wrong artist was a mistake that could not be undone.
